definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Hereditary breast cancer commonly occurs in premenopausal women.
sentences.chinese: 遗传性乳癌通常发生于绝经前妇女。

sentences.english: The study included nearly 46,000 postmenopausal U.
sentences.chinese: 这个研究包括了近46000名绝经后妇女。

sentences.english: To analyze the reasons for the failure to take out IUD ( intrauterine device ) for menopausal woman and the measures of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 分析绝经后妇女取环失败原因及治疗措施。

sentences.english: What's your opinion about hormones and menopause?
sentences.chinese: 你对于荷尔蒙和绝经怎么看？

sentences.english: This association was not observed among premenopausal African-American women.
sentences.chinese: 而在绝经前的美国黑人妇女中未发现这一相关性。

sentences.english: In men, post-menopausal women, and children iron is efficiently conserved by the body.
sentences.chinese: 在男性，绝经后妇女和儿童缺铁是有效保护的机构。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the causes for misdiagnosis of cardiovascular syndrome during peri- menopause.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨围绝经期妇女心血管症候群的误诊原因。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the status of depressive disorder in perimenopausal women and its relative factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨围绝经期女性抑郁障碍现状及相关因素。
抑郁影响绝经期症状吗？

sentences.english: For post menopausal women, take 3 teaspoonfuls daily, after a meal.
sentences.chinese: 绝经妇女，餐后服用3茶匙15ml，一天一次。

sentences.english: And postmenopausal use of hormone therapy dropped from 35 percent to 11 percent.
sentences.chinese: 绝经后妇女服用激素治疗者从35%下降到11%。

sentences.english: Objective To study the rehabilitation for perimenopausal women with stress urinary incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨围绝经期妇女压力性尿失禁的康复治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective Investigate the influence of skeletal muscle shrinkage on osteoporosis in ovariectomy rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骨骼肌收缩对绝经后骨质疏松骨结构的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of risedronate sodium in prevention and treatment for postmenopausal osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察利塞膦酸钠防治绝经后骨质疏松症的疗效。

sentences.english: Raloxifene is also used in prevention and treatment of osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.
sentences.chinese: 雷洛昔芬还被用于防治绝经后妇女骨质疏松症。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate correlative factors of surgical difficulties during IUD removal in postmenopausal women.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探讨与绝经后取环困难的相关因素。

definition: to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
